name: AmazeD 3D
description: Sharpen your brain - Widen your eyes - Grip your fingers. Here coming the Strange dream with full of puzzles, diverse landscapes, enchanting climate, spectacular villain and stunning little stories will take you to a RPG themed puzzle journey.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1 32-bit Processor: Intel i5 Dual-Core CPU 2 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 64-bit Processor: Intel i7 Quad-Core CPU 2.6 GHz or equivalent AMD CPU Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 400 MB available space
